titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Gubernatorial Inauguration Collection 2006-
titlestmt.subtitle: Gubernatorial Inauguration Mss. Acc. 2006.004, 2006.023, 2006.024

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid created by Anne Johnson, 2010

frontmatter.titlepage:
Inventory of the Gubernatorial Inauguration Collection, 2006- A Collection in the
Special Collections Research Center Mss. Acc. 2006.004, 2006.023, 2006.024
Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary 2012 &contact;
Processed By
Special Collections Staff.

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: Material from the inauguration of Timothy M. Kaine as Governor of Virginia held in Williamsburg. Newpaper clippings, programs, invitations and tickets.
did.origination: Democratic Party (Va.) Virginia General Assembly arrangement

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to all researchers.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Before reproducing or quoting from any materials, in whole or in part, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Research Center, and the holder of the copyright, if not Swem Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Gubernatorial Inauguration Collection, Special Collections Research Center, Swem Library, College of William and Mary.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The materials were acquired by Special Collections Research Center from Kathryn Blue, Virginia Cherry and Berna Heyman on 01/19/2006.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accessions 2006.23 and 2006.24 combined under 2006.04. Other material from Swem Library and SCRC staff also added to collection.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Further information about this individual or organization may be available in the Special Collections Research Center Wiki: http://scrc.swem.wm.edu/wiki/index.php/Democratic Party of Virginia. Further information about this individual or organization may be available in the Special Collections Research Center Wiki: http://scrc.swem.wm.edu/wiki/index.php/Democratic Party (Va.).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Material from the inauguration of Timothy M. Kaine as Governor of Virginia held in Williamsburg. Newpaper clippings, programs, invitations and tickets.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This Collection is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.
